website_summaries.verdict: Attractive shades, moisturizing formula, and comfortable wear make this lip stain ideal for anyone who doesn't want a drying product. Can also be used to shade the cheeks.
pros: Goes on smoothly, and is buildable, so it's ideal for creating natural and dramatic looks
Gel formula feels lightweight on the lips
cons: Liquid consistency requires a bit of practice to apply it accurately
Takes a few minutes to dry
You may need to reapply it during the day

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a "stain."
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a "stain." One sip of water or a quick lick of the lips and it's gone. The color is lovely, the texture makes it look like naturally healthy lips, and if you apply several layers, letting it dry in between, you can make it darker, but it just doesn't last long enough. You'd do better to apply beet juice with a Q-tip than to use this. If you like looking at yourself in the mirror and applying this light tint several times an hour, and if you don't actually have to get any work done, it's perfect, but otherwise, don't waste your money. It is lovely and very natural looking as a blush.
customer_reviews.author: Forgettable Woman

customer_reviews.title: I love it, but I wear it under lip gloss.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I actually really like this stuff, but I don't use it on its own. There's definitely a learning curve with it. First of all, it has the consistency of water. So you put it on, and need to give it like 3 minutes or so to dry. It's very matte once dry. After that, I then layer on lip gloss on top of it (I prefer Mary Kay, with the tube and wand). It stays on all day, even after eating or drinking, way more so than if I did the lip gloss alone. I can't really comment on the product if worn by itself, because I don't really like the matte look on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I first discovered theBalm Stainiac when I got a sample in my Birchbox. This is my all-time favorite lip stain and I've tried a lot! I'm a redhead so it's hard to pick a lip color that won't clash with my hair. This just enhances your natural skin tone to make it feel natural. I use it daily in the mornings. Once it dries, I'll apply a layer of chapstick to keep them moisturized. If I'm going out at night and want a bolder look, I'll apply two or three layers to get it darker.
customer_reviews.author: Ida May

customer_reviews.title: Best gel-based stain out there
customer_reviews.text: This is my new favorite stain. I feel like ive tried e ery lip stain Sephora has to offer. Before this, Benetint was my jam. But this has easily become my go-to lip color. Its more of a gel based stain and doesn't feel all dry like Benetint. Feels soft. I top it off with clear gloss, but truly, it doesnt even really need it. I just like the feel of gloss.
customer_reviews.author: B Boldi

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: This looked mostly how I expected as far as the metallic effect went, which was nice. The color tone wasn’t great for me but that’s challenging to know in advance when you’re buying lip color online. It wasn’t a problem with the product itself. It has a very sweet smell, a bit like cupcakes. It lasted quite a long time, which I liked, and didn’t transfer to surfaces much. It was just far too drying for my lips. I wouldn’t be able to wear it frequently enough to make it worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty on fair skin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: quite subtle, lasts and fades evenly, pretty color on fair neutral skin for a my lips but better look, sheer for a natural look, non drying Cons: takes three coats to get a very faint red stain on my fairly light lips. Still, it builds quite well. Tips: make sure lips are totally clean before use. No balm etc. Bottom line: if you want a cleaner version of Benetint, but don’t want to spend $30 on lipsense, give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Won't use anything else. It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for like six years. I've tried some other things over that time and go right back to my stainiac the next day. It's the most subtle color. It blends into your skin and looks completely natural. Just a lil color in your cheeks without looking like any makeup
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: This stain is good but not great. It stays on longer than lipstick, but not as long as I would like. You'll have a small amount of color left after eating a meal but I'd really like something that stays on all evening. Still, I can recommend it for the nice color and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G.

customer_reviews.title: Drying, not flattering
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a beauty YouTuber raves about it, but I didn’t like it. The color went on patchy and the product was drying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It still offers a nice, finished look without being tacky or too "young
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a subtle glow, this stain is for you. I tried it in Birchbox ages ago, and when I saw it on Amazon, I knew it was...retail fate? So I bought it, and use it everyday for when I don't want to wear powder blush or bronzer. It still offers a nice, finished look without being tacky or too "young."
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra K.

customer_reviews.title: it does have good staying power and it also is very pigmented as ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product only three stars because it does not apply evenly. It pools or settles into certain areas of the lips (creases) and also bleeds very badly. The down side to this is once it's on it's difficult to get off unless you use makeup remover.... but who carries that with them during the day?? With that said, it does have good staying power and it also is very pigmented as well as buildable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T.Top Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain. It goes on light but you can build up the color. It isn't sticky & doesn't transfer once dry. It stays on for a few hours & looks ok while wearing off. I just reapply a little when I notice it's starting to fade. This is much better than a lot of the more expensive luxury brands. Sometimes for extra color or longer wear I mix it with the body shops lip stain.
customer_reviews.author: April Munsch

customer_reviews.title: Love Staniac. Very sheer, a bit drying. Pros outweigh cons.
customer_reviews.text: Lighter than expected, a bit drying. Always love Staniac products though (prom queen is the best but can't find it anywhere) I love that you can put this on cheeks and lips, as I am always on the go and it makes my bag lighter and I can quickly put it on anywhere. Very natural, which it wasn't as drying, because I always have to put a bit of chapstick on after (wait for it to dry first). Not really a problem, though. Also, waiting for it to dry and then applying more makes it a bit more visible. Overall, love Staniac and always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: one of my all-time favorite products
customer_reviews.text: this lip/cheekstain is the only beauty product i routinely run out of. for people who prefer natural-looking (i.e., not heavy) makeup, it’s honestly the PERFECT product for either under-cheek blush or rosy lips. this is the darker red of their shades, despite it looking kind of pink in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amara H

customer_reviews.title: Good color and good staying power
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! I also love the consistency. It sticks to your lips really well and you can layer it to deepen the color. It lasts about half the day and you need to put lip balm over it to keep your lips hydrated. It gives your lips a very natural look, which I love! I wish they had a deep red available. I would buy it in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little color
customer_reviews.text: This was disappointing and not worth the price. The Beauty Queen shade yielded little color even after two applications and was sticky and did not dry. I was looking for more of a cherry shade and got that with the Etude House Dear Darling Water Tint Strawberry Ade which is 1/3 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Slayr

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I needed
customer_reviews.text: I need a lip stain that lasts without flaking or fading. This stuff looks pretty nice and can definitely be layered to make the shade as deep as you want or as barely there as you like. It can be very suble, a pinkish blush on your lips and cheeks or a deep red pucker. I do not use ot for blush so much, but suspect this is its best use as my lips never last very long. It does have a nice way of letting your lips live, it doesnt get all grungey or dry, but it really lasts for a half hour or less even with careful applications. I will keep looking for the stain that works.
customer_reviews.author: rad

customer_reviews.title: Not a stain
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't go on strong but this thing is WAY too watery. It fades very quickly as well so I don't understand how it is a "stain"?? Might as well rub some red juice on your lips- might stay on longer. For the price, it is definitely not worth it. There are cheaper brands that are much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Top beauty product favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Hawaii and always have sun-kissed cheeks (face...lol)... Sometimes when I want a little pop of color, especially for evenings out, this is my go-to product. I don't like cream or powder blush, so this gel is lightweight and perfect. I love that it's dual purpose, as a stain for the lips too. Can't rage enough about this, absolutely love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I love this lip stain
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain. It is the perfect shade for me, a pinkish-red, and its intensity doesn't need to be blotted before applying gloss. Because it is not a 100% pure stain (it is suspended in some sort of light jelly-like substance, which makes application easier and smoother), you could actually get away with not putting a gloss over it, but that's just how I roll.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay M. Coppens

customer_reviews.title: It does stain the lips and it stays on for hours.
customer_reviews.text: It works. Put it on, wait until it feels dry then makeup your lips the way you want. I used it wrong at first. I would put it on and not wait till it dried so it would not stay long. when you wait for it to dry, it stays all day i kid you not. The color is really light pink however on a darker skin it looks weird, so i finish with a lip gloss and it looks fantastic. The lip gloss wear off but the balm stays on. The only down side for me is the feel of dryness when i use the balm itself. Other than that, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle A

customer_reviews.title: 😠
customer_reviews.text: I love the balm products. This is the first that I was disappointed. The lip stain doesn't go on very well. Seems like I had to put coat after coat after coat on. And once I got it to stain. It didnt last more then a few minutes. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: poe

customer_reviews.title: Not the best in the Lip Stain Market
customer_reviews.text: I do like this as a quick lip stain but the color quickly fades and I have to keep re-applying. I saw a lot of Youtube beauty bloggers that gave good reviews on this lip stain which is why I purchased to try. I have recently found other lip stains that are much affordable with a way better color stain and color hold. I gave this one a 2 out of 5 sars. it's OK. you can find better.
customer_reviews.author: Jalissa Queen👑

customer_reviews.title: Best lip-stain ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for a few years now. It adds a beautiful pinkish tone to your lips--or add another coat to make it even brighter. It lasts all morning--I usually reapply after eating/drinking if I blot my mouth a lot after messy meals.
customer_reviews.author: kasimonsen

customer_reviews.title: Looks sexy!!
customer_reviews.text: Super nice product. It looks really nice when you apply on your cheeks and lips. It does dry my lips out though but if you’re okay with a little irritation - it does look good!! I can’t seem to figure out how to scoop out the bottom of the product though!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlene B

customer_reviews.title: Color for lips and cheeks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and use it almost daily. With older wrinkly skin, blush and powder makeup doesn't look very good. Staniac give some me a chance to color my lips and put a little blush on my cheeks that looks natural. I also use a clear lip gloss because, as others have mentioned before, this product does seem dry on the lips.
customer_reviews.author: Petie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Lip/Cheek Stain!
customer_reviews.text: I love the texture of this as it is a gel. I really love theBalm products and this is a great makeup staple! It works on lips and is perfect for cheeks too! It sets very quickly so apply knowing this or you may end up with streaks and blots along your lips. One star knocked off as the color is a pretty berry red but is not flattering on all skin tones. I wish they made this with a coral or peachy tone!
customer_reviews.author: Decadent Tenshi

customer_reviews.title: ) I like the product because it allows time to blend
customer_reviews.text: This is not the first time I've purchased this product (although it was the first time from this vendor.) I like the product because it allows time to blend, can be layered for more intensity, lasts through the day, and is very portable. I use it on both lips and cheeks, with gloss over it on lips. Perfect for travel. Works well on bare skin, but I usually wear a tinted moisturizer under it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer NAS

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty, sheer shade of red but does not last and my lips felt somewhat dry immediately after applying. I would not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: diwell

customer_reviews.title: Great natural flush for cheeks
customer_reviews.text: Blend quickly!! Longer lasting than Benetint on cheeks—I think it has to do with the gel formulation. I haven’t used it on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Stain Lips
customer_reviews.text: This product did not leave a stain at all. It takes multiple applications to get any color, which then results in a sticky feeling. The color completely wipes off. If you are looking for a true staining lip product, do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherRTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite products!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and was happy to find it on amazon since they sold out on their actual website. I use this as a lip stain and a cheek stain. You can layer it on your lips to increase the color. And it’s a fantastic to-go product for reapplying blush and lips in your little purse!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Great for cheeks, not for lips.
customer_reviews.text: Great as a cheek stain, but not as a lip stain. Its really light and pinkish on my lips. But its nice under lipstick to ensure a longer lasting color. For years I have been looking for a lip stain that is as good as one I had from Philosophy that they don't make any more. Just haven't had any luck. But for nice rosy cheeks that last all day, this stain works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ajasyoga

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed by this balm at all. It gives a VERY subtle touch of color for a brief period of time. Does not dry or moisture my lips. I do not think it has actually "stained" my lips at all which is what I wanted for a subtle, natural, all day look. Perhaps it works better for others with lighter lips however I do not consider myself to have dark lips-probably about average. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: felicity7

customer_reviews.title: Received this as a sample and really liked it, so I purchased the full size
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a sample and really liked it, so I purchased the full size. The color is nice, though I've found that if I don't finish it off with some sort of lipgloss or balm, it's very drying on my lips. Seems to hold up throughout the day without needing to do touchups.
customer_reviews.author: saravr

customer_reviews.title: stays on and color is totally adjustable from natural to dramatic depending on how much you put on AWESOME product!!!
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is amazing. it can be natural or dramatic depending on how much you put on. i was surprised that i put on at lunch time and before bed saw it was still on. i like the natural look so it just looked like i had perfectly naturally blushed lips (which i don't). i love so much i bought more for my nieces and friends. i will definitely be purchasing again for myself when i run out. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: beautyone

customer_reviews.title: Nice Natural Rosey Lip Tint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in Beauty Queen and it's the only color I've tried. I use this on the weekends to give my lips more of a natural color when I don't feel like wearing lipstick, however, I do have to apply a few coats to get it to the shade of natural rosy red that I like. Then, once dried I just apply gloss on top for moisture. I wouldn't say it lasts all day, probably more like half a day if you aren't eating, but a nice alternative for those dress down days.
customer_reviews.author: KarenP

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have used it for a few years. I like to put it on my lips for a hint of pink and then put chapstick or gloss on top. I put it on my cheeks sometimes too but it doesn't last long on my cheeks so I wouldn't recommend this product if you are primarily looking for something to use as a blush.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle (Atlanta, GA)

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It shows enough of your natural lip color to make the shade right for your skin tone. As with any stain you should exfoliate your lips before you apply this or it will enhance cracks and creases. Once I figured that out I wear it all the time. You can apply it, let it dry, blot, add another coat to darken the color. It lets you decide how intense the color will be.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: I love this product for an everyday lip color
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for an everyday lip color. I first tried it when I received it as a sample in my Birchbox. It looks super dark in the tube but goes on much lighter to give just a hint of color. It will dry to a matte finish. This isn't a gloss. If you're looking for gloss you're in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.author: SMHSmith

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed with this product and will not order it again
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product and will not order it again. It was a lot of money for what it was and I constantly have to reapply it. The color is not bad and does look natural but I have used other stain products that cost half as much and last all day. Plus I feel like this product dried out my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Shrena Gold

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, natural look
customer_reviews.text: Love this stain. It’s easy to put on, gives a dewy, natural look, and stays on all day. The color is translucent enough to mesh with multiple skin tones (I am olive). I’ve repurchased a few times.
customer_reviews.author: kristamd

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for years! Perfect for my everyday natural look. Gives my lips that natural pink tone so I don’t look dead without lipstick. Perfect with chapsticks.
customer_reviews.author: DBacoy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty color but it goes on like a gel and does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product does not stain your lips. The color is so transparent, it's hard to see when applying. Disappointed- will not order again
customer_reviews.author: Slink

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: The only con on this product is that it tastes pretty yucky if you lick your lips before it's dry. Otherwise, it provides a light color for a long time that does not come off on your glass or teeth or napkin or my husband's lips.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly Right
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I am very fair skinned and this is just perfect to give me back a more youthful natural color. I am very sensitive to lipsticks and stains - they usually dry my lips out. Stainiac doesn't! It is a true stain not a lipstick. The color stays all day and looks like you not some pasty overlay.
customer_reviews.author: sas

customer_reviews.title: Settles into lines, requires constant reapplication for evenness
customer_reviews.text: Settles in hard to even nourished lips. Years ago I loved this project but maybe they changed the formula.
customer_reviews.author: Sarina Daniels

customer_reviews.title: All dried up
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this before from department store and I love it. I do not like the feel of lipstick. This particular tube i received was dried up. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip product
customer_reviews.text: A friend got this in an Ipsy and I became obsessed. The perfect lip product to accentuate
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Quickly adds a little lip color
customer_reviews.text: It gives my lips a little more color and is easy to apply. It's probably good to carry in your bag if you want some quick lip color (e.g. for a sudden group photo), especially if you don't usually wear makeup or only light makeup. I'm had it for awhile, hasn't dried up yet.
customer_reviews.author: C. L.

customer_reviews.title: The stain doesnt stay long.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, looks very natural, but it doesn't "stain". It doesn't last long at all. There's a "just bitten" lip stain you can buy at the drugstore, I forget who makes it, but it is the same quality as this and much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: daniela

customer_reviews.title: This product is no better than the cheap drugstore stains that don't work
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. This product is no better than the cheap drugstore stains that don't work, but this one costs triple. The stain goes on easily, but quickly fades, when I say quickly, I was reapplying 30 minutes later. Huge disappointment. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Avi

customer_reviews.title: Nice color. You can apply it lightly or layer ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. You can apply it lightly or layer it for a darker color. I don't really like to use it as a blush. It doesn't seem to blend well with my foundation. It works well when I am not wearing foundation though! Lasts longer than lip glosses/lip sticks. But I need to reapply it occasionally.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lip and cheek stain
customer_reviews.text: Great stain! Just a hint of color that's easy to layer for more intensity. Feels completely weightless. No, like seriously weightless! Long-lasting. Looks great on all skin tones (I'm brown skinned)! I used to use Origins Pinch My Cheeks (still love it) but like this better because of the wand.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Pinkard

customer_reviews.title: Great for nights out or for work!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stain color. It looks like a light red on me with one layer or brighter red with 2+ layers, I have very fair skin. This is not a gloss so if you're wanting something glossy you'll want to put something on top. I usually put this on with a light pink gloss on top. This will still long after the gloss is gone. It can be a little drying so I only recommend you out it on once or twice a day to avoid too much dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Cissyboo

customer_reviews.title: Best Lip Stain
customer_reviews.text: This is still the best Lip stain I’ve every had. You can’t feel it on your lips at all it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: Long stay, but unnatural color
customer_reviews.text: I miss the old colors. Too bad there's only the one option now. It doesn't work on everybody.
customer_reviews.author: Love2shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Healthy glow
customer_reviews.text: If you want that peaches and cream natural glow, this product will provide you with the tool to make everyone believe you are doing everything right. Seriously, I have received more compliments of telling me how *healthy* I have been looking lately. I am certain it is really this addition to my morning make-up application.
customer_reviews.author: Imgels

customer_reviews.title: I come back to this over and over
customer_reviews.text: Best lip and cheek stain ever. Perfect color every time, gorgeous pinkish- red. No weird feeling on your lips or cheeks. Won’t make you break out
customer_reviews.author: FoxFace

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite lip stain - ever. It is great for everyday use with just a layer or two, or you can add more layers for an evening and night look. My only complaint is that it leaves my lips a little sticky. You have to wait about an hour for it to fully dry before trying to apply chapstick, or else some of the stain will transfer to the chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I just it as my emergency blush/lip color when I run out the door and forget to put on makeup. I don't wear it on a daily basis though so not sure how long it lasts because I've never paid attention to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: I promptly lost this product and don't miss it at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm a lip stain connoisseur. I'd read positive reviews about this one online so I decided to try it out. Unfortunately, it wasn't anywhere near as dark on me as I'd hoped. It was also much more drying than other stains I've tried (all stains are drying I realize). I promptly lost this product and don't miss it at all.
customer_reviews.author: IveGotSomethingToSay

customer_reviews.title: Love this stain!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping. I got a same of this stain in my Birchbox and I loved it! I have medium golden toned/olive skin and this is the first stain I have tried that I liked. This goes on very light and is buildable if you let it dry between applications. You can use it for a natural look of make it heavier. Love this. First time trying the Balm products.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Jennings

customer_reviews.title: This is the lip stain I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY. I was looking for a replacement for Sephora's Lush Flush, which had been discontinued. This is it! A nice, natural looking lip stain that isn't ridiculously bright or a lipstick in disguise. The best I can compare it to is Benetint in gel form. This is my new go-to for my everyday look.
customer_reviews.author: diz

customer_reviews.title: Great color, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stain! It gives my cheeks the perfect flush. I also use benetint, but I prefer Stainiac for carrying around my purse because as a gel I'm less worried it's going to leak all over my purse accidentally. Plus the color is a little bit brighter and pinker than benetint. Great stain, will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Livia

customer_reviews.title: Great Lip stain
customer_reviews.text: Great lip stain... I apply in the morning to give a nice light color to my lips that looks pretty natural that lasts most of the day. Pros- last all day, nice natural color Cons-can dry out the lips a bit
customer_reviews.author: Loren B.

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t do anything
customer_reviews.text: This is doesn’t even color my lips like regular lipstick....let alone stain it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Color is great and you can reapply for darker shades
customer_reviews.text: Color is great and you can reapply for darker shades. It makes my lips tingle a bit when I first apply it, but nothing to complain about. This does bleed onto my skin and on the inside of my lips, but I can just dab it off. Stays on all day and is a nice shade!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie Blair

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it gives my lips and cheeks a truly natural glow. This is my first stain though so I am not sure how it performs versus others, but I think the color is flattering and the product doesn't make me break out or anything like that. I'm excited to try other products from the balm.
customer_reviews.author: Tk

customer_reviews.title: Nice stain, natural look
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Color is a tad too pinkish/blue for my complexion. Would be perfect if it'd been a teeny bit more orange-y. Wish I'd been able to test it first, but as far as a cheek and lip stain, it's swell: great consistency, good staying power, high pigment, but goes on lightly and layers to stronger color.
customer_reviews.author: spoonfeeding

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! All I need is a few dots on each cheek for a natural glow! Be sure to apply one cheek at a time, and blend right away. Let set for a while, and if needed, you can build layer(s) of color until you get the color you want. I like a natural look, so I don't use that much.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Cordes

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I don't have time to reapply all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my third time to order this. I love it! I don't have time to reapply all day so this is perfect for me. I put a gloss over it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Barron

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as my daily blush. It lasts all day, is easy to blend and a little goes a long way. Very natural and youthful looking. Best part is it's all natural and won't irritate the most sensitive of skin, like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cheek and lip stain. It stays on my cheeks all day and gives a natural color. The lip stain has to be reapplied after eating or drinking, but that is not a problem for me. I will continue to use the BALM.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Griswold

customer_reviews.title: I would love to have it be a bit darker
customer_reviews.text: I would love to have it be a bit darker, but it makes a really good ylbb. If I need to look natural for some reason (I'm more the green eyeshadow and grey lips type) then it is my go to. I have not tried using it as a cheek stain.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Lip Stain
customer_reviews.text: I like this stain, you can build color too...I like to use a lip balm over stain which seems to help color stain a bit longer...Concerned that this item will soon not be available. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Giro

customer_reviews.title: Gives a natural look
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It gives a natural look. I put it on my cheeks an lips but I have a separate one for each. If I use the same one on both my lips and cheeks, my skin breaks out. My cheeks look naturally rosie when I have this on. I like to look like I am not wearing any makeup while actually wearing makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Shaniqua Jones a.k.a. LeeRoy

customer_reviews.title: This is her all time favorite lip stain and she can't be without it
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th one I have bought for my mom. This is her all time favorite lip stain and she can't be without it! It really lasts a long time and has a great color and doesn't get flakey like some stains nor does it get blotchy!
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Decent stain for the price. It definitely could last ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent stain for the price. It definitely could last a little longer..... If you are not familiar with what a lip stain is and are expecting a smooth moisturizing application you should purchase a gloss or other product. This has all aspects of a stain except the staying power....
customer_reviews.author: hap32

customer_reviews.title: Not Like Benetint -- Lighter and Need to Reapply
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent product, but I was hoping it would serve as a longer lasting Benetint. I've been using Benetint for almost 10 years and it is totally "my lips but better." My qualm with it is that it doesn't last long, but neither does Stainiac and it's also lighter than Benetint. Sigh. The search continues.
customer_reviews.author: bomchickawahwah

customer_reviews.title: love it. Just don't put too much on or ...
customer_reviews.text: love it. Just don't put too much on or do both cheeks at once. The stain settles in pretty quick so you want to layer color if you need to - not try to remove as it settles. Blush is my number one go to make up product and this is perfect. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: niki

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product! The color is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! The color is beautiful, although it is lighter than I thought it would be. But I just put on a couple coats until it's the tint I like. I've eaten and drank with it on with no need to reapply! You can put chapstick or lip gloss over top to make it glossy or shiny. This is truly a great product, especially if you find yourself constantly reapplying lipstick, no need to with this stain!
customer_reviews.author: Kbrind

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's gel based stain that you can put on your lips and face. The color is lighter when you apply it. It looks cute on cheek and can last a long time. With the price, it's a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Acat

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice light lip stain
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice light lip stain, beautiful shade of red. Great for my young daughter who wants to occasionally wear lipstick like me ;)
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad product and I'm happy I tried it. It looks OK on my skin, my complexion changes from fair-ish to tanned frequently (I'm Asian).
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: The anti-lipstick.
customer_reviews.text: No oily marks on glasses and cutlery. It stays on through meals, kissing, and other, um, activities. Great color, minimal touch ups ... just add a bit of lipbalm for moisture and you're done. The color stays on all day and the tube lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: L. Mayer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. I build it on my cheeks to achieve whatever blush effect I want. It's a very flattering color for any skin type. I can't see why anyone wouldn't love Stainiac!
customer_reviews.author: WreckedandFlustered

customer_reviews.title: Staple of my beauty routine
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I had a sample in a previous Birchbox, and was so sad when I ran out. It gives the perfect rosy/natural glow to my olive complexion under my makeup. It blends nicely, lasts all day, and a little goes a long way. I also love using it as a lip stain, as I find it hard to keep regular lipstick on for long periods of time (lick my lips a lot). I'm very happy with this product and would suggest it to just about anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ERob

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to wear under my SPF lip balm for outdoor summer activities and it worked great! Added a subtle, lovely wash of color to my lips that lasted for hours and hours even through eating, drinking, and many lip balm re applications.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect stain, not long wearing
customer_reviews.text: The perfect color. Just what it looks like when you bit your lips... makes you look awake and soft. It is build able and perfect for both night time makeup as well as no makeup-makeup. However, this is not long wearing. I constantly have to reapply throughout the day and any time after I eat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: easy to use, because the color doesn't set immediately. I don't use it much as a lip stain, but it works very well as a natural-looking blush, and does not fade in the course of a day. best of all, it washes off easily.
customer_reviews.author: rita t. fogelman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip stain I've ever bought online. I love it so much that I am almost out of it already!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: It looks wonderful on her not to dark and the best part ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this lip stain... It looks wonderful on her not to dark and the best part it doesn't rub off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite stains! I use it almost every morning
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite stains! I use it almost every morning. Has a great natural color but you can build it up for a more dramatic look. One of my favorite beauty products ever.
customer_reviews.author: renee688

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lip stain because once you put it on and let it dry it lasts a long time and you can put on any gloss or chapstick over it and it will so cute. And if you want the color to be darker just put another coat on after you let the first one dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Andre

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Goes on with a finger so nicely. Just swirl it around and there you go. A really nice color for a blush. No complaints at all. It would be nice to have a container you could squeeze or manipulate so you can get all the contents out, but the color is so beautiful that I'm fine with that aspect.
customer_reviews.author: LookingatLaguna

customer_reviews.title: Looks dark red, but blends in great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Goes on great and stays put...especially on oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Debi D

customer_reviews.title: Short endurance.
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging and consistency, but it does not last long at all, maybe 2 hours tops, that was with 3 coats of it. But I do have to talk a lot at work, so that may have an impact on performance.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. Sephora stopped selling it and I was thrilled to find it here. It stays on forever.....make yourself as rosy as you want.
customer_reviews.author: Kirasheba

product_meta.title: Stainiac Lip & Cheek Stain, Aloe-Infused Formula, Multi-Use, Buildable, Pigmented
product_meta.description:
Stainiac "hint of tint" works with all skin tones. Dab just a touch on your cheeks and lips; layer to pop the color. Fear not those dreaded streaks most tints leave behind - Stainiac's aloe-infused gel-based formula is designed to give you more time before the stain sets.

BRAND STORY
By theBalm
